name: Spells
description: A number of spells allow direct or indirect access to different planes of existence. *Gate* and *Plane Shift* can directly transport adventurers to any other plane, with different degrees of precision. *Etherealness* allows adventurers to enter the Ethereal Plane. And *Astral Projection* lets adventurers project themselves into the Astral Plane and from there travel to the Outer Planes.
